description: From Greek ρωμαίικος (romaíikos), from ρωμαϊκός (romaïkós), from Ancient Greek Ῥωμαϊκός (Rhōmaïkós). Cf. Koine Ῥωμαῖος (Rhōmaîos), meaning "Roman".

adjectives.description: Romaic (comparative more Romaic, superlative most Romaic)

entries.meaning: (archaic) Of or pertaining to the Byzantine Empire, its inhabitants, or its language.
(obsolete) Of or pertaining to modern Greece, its inhabitants, or its language.
